name: arghun
description: Module to count files in a given directory and as a result provide a JSON file with numbers, locations and filetypes

scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run release:bump-patch && npm run release:publish && npm run release:push
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm run release:bump-minor && npm run release:publish && npm run release:push
scripts.release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags

author: Lukasz Gornicki (derberg)
